rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action to close Request
rule.fullDesc: Run Scheduled Action to close Request
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":1,"calcField":"update.date","calcInterval":"7 00:00:00","calcScript":"","actionCondition":"(status in $L.file=\"Fulfilled\" and tod()>=(update.date in $L.file+'7 00:00:00'))","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"expression\"><Expression caption=\"\">\"status in $L.file="Fulfilled" and tod()>=(update.date in $L.file+'7 00:00:00')\"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","rulesetName":"rm.close.open.tasks","action":"close.auto"}
